rules_text: Gain control of target nonland permanent until end of turn. Untap it. It gains haste until end of turn.
flavor_text: [i]“Okay, but what are we going to [/i]do [i]once we find[i] [/i]the Precursor tech?” asked Oscar. Lieutenant Saxon chuckled. “Drive it like we stole it.”[/i]
